Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive

Class BoardHandling

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive.BoardHandlingImpl
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.interactive.BoardHandling
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoardHandling
public class BoardHandling extends BoardHandlingImpl
Central connection class between the graphical user interface and the board database.

      public boolean read_design(ObjectInputStream p_design, TestLevel p_test_level)
      Reads an existing board design from the input stream. Returns false, if the input stream does not contains a legal board design.

    • import_design

      public DsnFile.ReadResult import_design(InputStream p_design, BoardObservers p_observers, IdNoGenerator p_item_id_no_generator, TestLevel p_test_level)
      Imports a board design from a Specctra dsn-file. The parameters p_item_observers and p_item_id_no_generator are used, in case the board is embedded into a host system. Returns false, if the dsn-file is corrupted.

    • export_to_dsn_file

      public boolean export_to_dsn_file(OutputStream p_output_stream, String p_design_name, boolean p_compat_mode)
      Writes the currently edited board design to a text file in the Specctra dsn format. If p_compat_mode is true, only standard specctra dsn scopes are written, so that any host system with an specctra interface can read them.

    • export_eagle_session_file

      public void toggle_select_action(Point2D p_point)
      Picks item at p_point. Removes it from the selected_items list, if it is already in there, otherwise adds it to the list. Changes to the selected items state, if something was selected.

      Start interactively creating a polygon shaped obstacle.

    • start_adding_hole

      public void start_adding_hole(Point2D p_point)
      Actions to be taken, when adding a hole to an existing obstacle shape on the board is started.

    • get_interactive_state

      public InteractiveState get_interactive_state()
      Gets the current interactive state.

    • set_interactive_state

      public void set_interactive_state(InteractiveState p_state)

    • adjust_design_bounds

      public void adjust_design_bounds()
      Adjust the design bounds, so that also all items being still placed outside the board outline are contained in the new bounds.

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Sets all references inside this class to null, so that it can be recycled by the garbage collector.
